EmailTemplate.name: Event - Accelerate 2015 - Workshops.Email - Confirmation Workshop - Business dri
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmation: Workshop "Business driven API Testing"
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Thank you for registering for our Accelerate 2015 workshop!
With this email we are confirming your seat in the Business driven API Testing workshop, taking place at 4:15 pm in the Salon Aichinger of the Novomatic Forum on October 22, 2015.
Please pick up your entry pass to the workshop at the Accelerate 2015 registration table.
We look forward to seeing you at Accelerate!
Best regards,
Your Tricentis Events Team
